Class codegen.CodeGenOpt 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----codegen.CodeGenOpt
public class CodeGenOpt
extends Object

envFlavor
Current flavor for environment.
nondetFlavor
Current flavor of non-determinism handling
none
Do not generate code for an environment.
random
Choose an enabled transition randomly.
roundRobin
Try to cycle through enabled transitions.
simple
Generate the code for a simple environment.
takeFirst
Take the first Transition enabled.
traceCodeGen
Do we want to generate a generation trace?
verbose
Do we want to generate verbose output.

CodeGenOpt()
Standard constructer.

takeFirst 
 public static final int takeFirst
Take the first Transition enabled.

roundRobin 
 public static final int roundRobin
Try to cycle through enabled transitions.

random 
 public static final int random
Choose an enabled transition randomly.

none 
 public static final int none
Do not generate code for an environment.

simple 
 public static final int simple
Generate the code for a simple environment. This is an environment without user interaction. It will treat the statechart as a closed system.

nondetFlavor 
 public int nondetFlavor
Current flavor of non-determinism handling

envFlavor 
 public int envFlavor
Current flavor for environment.

traceCodeGen 
 public boolean traceCodeGen
Do we want to generate a generation trace?

verbose 
 public boolean verbose
Do we want to generate verbose output.

CodeGenOpt 
 public CodeGenOpt()
Standard constructer. We use the following defaults: nondetFlavor = takeFirst, envFlavor = none, traceCodeGen = false, verbose = false.
